summary: An insane, bizarre dungeon unlike anything you\'ve ever seen before!
descriptionHtml:
A bizarre, unorthodox dungeon unlike anything you\'ve ever seen

Formerly part of the Sheogorath Shout/Call of Madness mod, the dungeon has now been moved

The entrance can be found near Anise\'s cabin, at the point on the map screenshot

Also available on the Steam Workshop - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=19436

Known Bugs:
- Enemies\' hats stay hovering over where their heads used to be when they are decapitated
- May run into compatibility problems if you have other dungeon mods loaded, or mods like Dovahkiin\'s Hideout. This is a common problem with player-created dungeons, and it\'s a good idea to only have a few running at any time
author: Kingston3K
